title: Sleep Mastery
subtitle: The foundation you keep ignoring
description: Sleep is the foundation of everything—mood, cognition, regulation, healing. This course covers the science of sleep, why yours might be broken, and practical protocols for actually getting the rest you need.

whatYouLearn: Understand why sleep is foundational for everything
Know what makes sleep actually restorative
Work with nervous system dysregulation that prevents sleep
requirements: Current sleep difficulties or desire to optimize
Consult doctor for serious sleep disorders

questions.question: Why is sleep considered foundational?
options: Sleep affects mood, cognition, immune function, healing, and emotional regulation
It's not that important if you're healthy

questions.question: What are the main stages of sleep?
options: Light sleep, deep sleep (slow-wave), and REM sleep in repeating cycles

questions.question: What commonly disrupts sleep quality?
options: Blue light, irregular schedule, caffeine, alcohol, stress, and room temperature

questions.question: What is the ideal sleep environment?
options: Cool, dark, quiet, and associated only with sleep

questions.question: How does nervous system dysregulation affect sleep?
options: An activated nervous system can't shift into the rest states needed for sleep
Only trauma survivors have this issue

questions.question: What helps establish healthy sleep patterns?
options: Consistent sleep/wake times, light exposure, and wind-down routines
